name: Devil, Arch, Iorvensiav
damage_resistances: psychic; bludgeoning, nonmagical P/S attacks not made w/silvered weapons

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite and two Claws. Can replace one Claw with Freezing Chain.

actions.name: Freezing Chain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 16 (2d6+9) slashing damage + 7 (2d6) cold and target is grappled (escape DC 21). Until this grapple ends target is restrained and takes 14 (4d6) cold at start of each of its turns and she can’t make Freezing Chain attacks vs. others.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 20 (2d10+9) piercing damage and 7 (2d6) cold.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 16 (2d6+9) slashing damage and 7 (2d6) cold.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, 20 ft., one target, 18 (2d8+9) slashing damage and 7 (2d6) cold. Ignores resistance to slashing and if she rolls a 20 on the attack she cuts off one of the target’s heads. Target dies if it can’t survive with o the lost head. If target doesn’t have a head or can’t be decapitated takes extra 27 (6d6) slashing damage instead.

actions.name: Thundering Ice Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: She exhales a booming frigid spray in a 90' cone. Each creature in that area: 45 (8d10) cold and 45 (8d10) thunder (DC 21 Con half). A creature that fails by 5+ is stunned until end of its next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Chilling Wings (2)
legendary_actions.desc: Beats her wings releasing a blast of icy wind. Each creature within 15 ft. of her: 14 (4d6) cold and be stunned until end of its next turn (DC 21 Con no damage or stun). She can then fly up to half her flying speed.

special_abilities.name: Death Throes
special_abilities.desc: When she dies she explodes and each creature within 30' of her: 70 (20d6) cold (DC 21 Con half). The explosion freezes objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried encapsulating them in ice.

special_abilities.name: Freezing Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Weapon attacks are magical. When she hits with any weapon extra 2d6 cold (included below).
